pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṁ aññatarassa pūgassa saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.4_0: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū yena so pūgo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.9_0: “Bahū, āvuso, saṅghassa dāyakā, bahū saṅghassa bhattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.10_0: Mayaṁ tumhe nissāya tumhe sampassantā idha viharāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.11_0: Tumhe ce amhākaṁ na dassatha, atha ko carahi amhākaṁ dassati?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.13_0: Atha kho so pūgo chabbaggiyehi bhikkhūhi nippīḷiyamāno yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ datvā saṅghaṁ bhattena parivisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.14_0: Ye te bhikkhū jānanti saṅghassa sacīvarabhattaṁ paṭiyattaṁ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.14_1: na ca jānanti chabbaggiyānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ dinnanti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.17_0: Yathāpaṭiyattaṁ cīvaraṁ ayyā chabbaggiyā attano pariṇāmesun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.18_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.19_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.20_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.21_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.24_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.26_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:1.27.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmeyya, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.6_0: sāmaṁ vā jānāti aññe vā tassa ārocenti so vā āroceti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.15_0: Nissajjitabbaṁ saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.18_0: “idaṁ me, bhante, jānaṁ saṅghikaṁ lābhaṁ pariṇataṁ attano pariṇāmitaṁ nissaggiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.23.1_0: Pariṇate pariṇatasaññī attano pariṇāmeti, nissaggiyaṁ pācittiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.24_0: Pariṇate vematiko attano pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.26_0: Saṅghassa pariṇataṁ aññasaṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.27_0: Cetiyassa pariṇataṁ aññacetiyassa vā saṅghassa vā puggalassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.28_0: Puggalassa pariṇataṁ aññapuggalassa vā saṅghassa vā cetiyassa vā pariṇāmeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.33_0: kattha demāti pucchiyamāno yattha tumhākaṁ deyyadhammo paribhogaṁ vā labheyya paṭisaṅkhāraṁ vā labheyya
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.33_1: ciraṭṭhitiko vā assa yattha vā pana tumhākaṁ cittaṁ pasīdati tattha dethāti bhaṇati,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np30:2.43_0: “Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, tiṁsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā.
